comment: Amanda Knox wont tell people the truth about the last Supreme Court ruling i.e. there were multiple attackers, its a proven fact Amanda Knox was at the cottage when Meredith was killed, she washed Merediths blood off, she lied to the police and the break-in was staged.
amr:
# ::snt Amanda Knox wont tell people the truth about the last Supreme Court ruling i.e. there were multiple attackers, its a proven fact Amanda Knox was at the cottage when Meredith was killed, she washed Merediths blood off, she lied to the police and the break-in was staged.
(a / and
      :op1 (t / tell-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Amanda"
                        :op2 "Knox"))
            :ARG1 (t2 / truth
                  :topic (r / rule-01
                        :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Supreme"
                                    :op2 "Court"))
                        :mod (l / last))
                  :ARG1-of (m / mean-01
                        :ARG2 (p2 / person
                              :ARG0-of (a2 / attack-01)
                              :quant (m2 / multiple))))
            :ARG2 (p3 / person))
      :op2 (f / fact
            :ARG1-of (p4 / prove-01)
            :domain (b / be-located-at-91
                  :ARG1 p
                  :ARG2 (c / cottage)
                  :time (k / kill-01
                        :ARG1 (p5 / person
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Meredith")))))
      :op3 (w / wash-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (b2 / blood
                  :poss p5)
            :ARG2 (o / off))
      :op4 (l2 / lie-08
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG2 (p6 / police))
      :op5 (s / stage-01
            :ARG1 (b3 / break-02)))
